hero.title: We're More Than a Nursing Agency‚Äî
hero.description: We're family members, caregivers, and advocates who believe every individual deserves care that honors their unique spirit. B'Nore Care was built on a simple truth: families shouldn't have to choose between quality medical care and genuine human connection.

founderMessage.title: WHY B'NORE CARE
founderMessage.subtitle: A Personal Mission Born from the Heart
content: B'Nore Care exists to provide elevated, personalized home care solutions for individuals of all ages. We deliver care with compassion, clinical discernment, and genuine empathy‚Äîensuring dignity, safety, and peace of mind for every family that we serve.

whyChooseUs.title: What Makes Us Different
whyChooseUs.description: We could tell you about our credentials, our experience, our clinical excellence. And yes, all of that matters. But here's what really sets us apart:

points.title: We Remember the Little Things
points.description: Your nurse will know that specific preferences matter‚Äîlike knowing your loved one dislikes certain medical supplies or needs a few minutes of prep time before any procedure. Because the little things? They're actually the big things.

points.title: We Support the Whole Family
points.description: Siblings need attention too. Spouses need breaks. Extended family needs reassurance. We see all of you, and we're here to support everyone‚Äînot just the patient receiving care. Your family's well-being is our priority.

points.title: We Navigate the System WITH You
points.description: Insurance denials. Prior authorizations. GAPP applications. Medicaid waiver programs. We know this maze inside and out, and we'll walk beside you every step of the way. You shouldn't need a law degree to get the care your family deserves.

points.title: We're Available When You Need Us
points.description: Medical emergencies don't wait for business hours. Neither do we. 24/7 phone support from a registered nurse means you're never alone at 2 AM when something doesn't feel right. We answer. Every time.

ourPromise.title: Our Promise to You
content: We promise to show up‚Äînot just physically, but emotionally. We'll celebrate when your loved one achieves a new milestone. We'll problem-solve when equipment fails. We'll listen when you need to vent about the insurance company. We'll cry with you on the hard days and laugh with you on the good ones.

We promise to respect your expertise. You know your loved one better than anyone. We bring clinical skills; you bring intimate knowledge of what works and what doesn't. Together, we're an unbeatable team.

We promise that if something isn't working‚Äîif the nurse isn't the right fit, if the schedule needs adjusting, if you have concerns‚Äîyou can tell us. We'll listen without defensiveness and make it right. Your trust is sacred to us.
Most of all, we promise to see your loved one for who they are: a unique, valuable human being who deserves to be loved, respected, and cared for with dignity.

team.title: Meet the People Who Will Care for Your Loved One
team.subtitle: Every nurse on our team has been carefully selected not just for their clinical skills, but for their heart. They're compassionate professionals who understand that your loved one is your whole world.

features.title: Clinical Excellence
features.description: All of our nurses are licensed, experienced, and specially trained in complex care. They know trachs, vents, feeding tubes, and complex medication regimens inside and out.

features.title: Genuine Connection
features.description: But more than that, they genuinely care for people. They'll engage in meaningful activities, listen to stories, celebrate milestones, and become a trusted part of your family's support system.

features.title: Ongoing Support
features.description: Our team receives continuous training and support to ensure they're always providing the highest quality care. And if you ever have concerns, we're here to listen and make it right.

cta.title: Ready to Meet Your New Care Team?
cta.description: Let's talk about your family's unique needs and how we can support you. No pressure, no sales pitch‚Äîjust an honest conversation about whether B'Nore Care is the right fit for your family.
